numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Football is a sport.
2. Basketball is a sport.
3. In football, most players are people of color.
4. In basketball, most players are people of color.
5. In football, around 80% of players are people of color.
6. In basketball, around 80% of players are people of color.
7. Baseball is a sport.
8. Soccer is a sport.
9. In baseball, the distribution of players is more equal.
10. In soccer, the distribution of players is more equal.
11. In baseball, around 40% of players are people of color.
12. In baseball, around 60% of players are not people of color.
13. In soccer, around 40% of players are people of color.
14. In soccer, around 60% of players are not people of color.
15. In all sports, most head coaches are not people of color.
16. I wonder why many players are people of color.
17. I wonder why few head coaches are people of color.
18. This situation impacts our community.
19. In some sports, people of color have an equal opportunity to succeed as players.
20. The title of the article is: How diverse are Major League sports?
